settings.text_1: LOVE this shapewear! Just the right amount of compression, sucks everything in without being too tight (if you know, you know) and is super comfortable. Been reaching for this one over the other shapewear I have ‘cause it’s just that good. No digging or rolling either, even if I’m moving around and dancing! I feel soo confident in this. 10/10 recommend
settings.text_2: These really do make my post-baby bell look so much flatter and the amount of compression is perfect. I can still do all day to day mommy tasks without have to readjust a million times. The before and after with crazy!
settings.text_3: If you’re looking for something that smooths, shapes, and stays in place all day, this is it. I’ve worn it under a few body hugging dresses and it always delivers a flawless, sculpted look with that snatched midsection I wanted. I sized down, and it gave me the perfect fit. It’s comfortable yet supportive with zero rolling down. The material is soft, breathable, and honestly gives me that smooth, defined waist.

settings.heading: Product Details
settings.content:
• Fabric: Ultra-soft, lightweight, breathable & moisture wicking
  • Antimicrobial: Anti-odor & bacteria build up
  • High-rise design: Smooths & supports without squeezing
  • Camel toe proof tech: Specially designed gusset for a seamless fit
  • Stay-put waistband: No rolling, no digging, no adjusting
  • Seamless: No panty lines, no bulk
  • Tag-free comfort: Nothing to itch or irritate your skin

settings.heading: Easy Returns
settings.content: To keep you 100% protected we offer a 90 day free fit exchange and money-back guarantee. So if you need a different size, we’ll send you an exchange completely free, and if you aren’t fully satisfied with your order for whatever reason within 90 days, we’ll offer you a full refund. To qualify for the 90-day money-back guarantee, you’ll just have to fill out a quick feedback form, which helps us improve our product!

settings.heading: Shipping & Delivery
settings.content:
Due to the influx of orders from our ongoing sale, there will be a slight delay in order fulfilment. Rest assured, all orders will be shipped within 24-48 hours.

Depending on your geographic location, delivery typically takes 5-12 business days.

settings.heading: How to style
settings.content:
Daily Office Wear
Perfect for business attire and long days at the office

  • Provides comfortable tummy control under fitted work dresses and pencil skirts
  • Stays in place during commutes and desk work
  • Breathable fabric keeps you cool during stressful meetings


Special Events & Occasions
Ideal for weddings, formal events, and celebrations

  • Offers smooth silhouette under form-fitting dresses
  • Comfortable enough for dancing and extended wear
  • No visible lines under special occasion attire

Postpartum Comfort
Gentle support for recovering mothers

  • Soft, flexible fabric adapts to changing body shapes
  • Breathable material for all-day comfort
  • Light compression without feeling restrictive

settings.title: Everyday Shapewear - Breathable, Seamless, Feels Like Second Skin
settings.text: No digging, no rolling, no sweat, no camel toe—just pure comfort and effortless tummy control.

settings.text: Light, breathable tummy control that stays in place all day—without the squeezing, rolling, or discomfort. Plus, it's antimicrobial to keep you fresh, odor-free, and bacteria-free.

settings.title: Why Girls Are Switching To Olora Shapewear

settings.heading: The #1 Underwear Brand For Women
settings.text: What makes Olora stand out from all of the alternatives out there?
Shapewear has a place in every women's wardrobe, so we made sure we designed our thong to suit all shapes and sizes!
No panty lines, no bulk, no awkward seams and no camel toe. Whether it’s a bodycon dress, leggings, or your go-to jeans, this thong stays completely smooth and discreet.

settings.row_text: Felt more confident in fitted outfits with no panty lines or bulges.

settings.text_kgZqqO9VfnQf22pV: Get answers to common questions about our innovative Tummy Control Camel Toe Proof Thong.
settings.text_bDEuvav7rWKGqHdL: Are they comfortable to wear for long periods?
settings.text_ZBgYNKtJsADxdCtv: Absolutely! Our Tummy Control Thong is designed for all-day comfort with a seamless, breathable fabric and stay-put waistband—perfect for work, errands, or lounging without irritation.
settings.text_OsbEsC2Dg4EzUhrA: How much tummy control does it actually provide?
settings.text_TawrFZaUSQJsjymJ: Our thong offers light-to-medium compression, meaning it smooths and shapes your waistline without feeling suffocating. It’s not an extreme waist trainer or corset—just the right amount of support to enhance your natural curves while staying comfortable all day.
settings.text_UKOyvbwXYERkhJ4E: Our thongs come in sizes XS to XXL. We recommend choosing your usual underwear size for the best fit. If you're between sizes, we suggest sizing down for optimal performance. Check our size guide for detailed measurements to ensure the perfect fit.
settings.text_G88kPd4PAaAMnYGk: Yes! Made with moisture-wicking, breathable fabric, they keep you fresh, dry, and irritation-free—even on warm days or during long wear.
settings.text_35J6wpMQEPmd8a8L: Will this thong help with bloating or lower belly pooch?
settings.text_2hLpXMESOEn9oMfi: Yes! It’s designed to gently smooth out your tummy, helping reduce the appearance of bloating and lower belly bulge. The flexible fabric adapts to your body, so you’ll feel supported even during times of bloating.
settings.text_FZkCB1C4tefzNcZE: Yes, you can! The breathable, moisture-wicking fabric keeps you cool and dry, while the stay-put waistband ensures no rolling or shifting during movement. Perfect for workouts, yoga, and daily activities!
settings.text_FZkCB1C4tefzNcZE1: Yes! The wide, specially designed gusset ensures a smooth, flattering fit with no awkward front lines or bunching.
settings.text_FZkCB1C4tefzNcZE2: With proper care, our Tummy Control Thong will maintain its quality for over a year. However, for hygiene reasons—especially with frequent wear—we recommend refreshing your underwear collection every 6 months for the best fit and performance.
settings.text_FZkCB1C4tefzNcZE3: We offer a 90-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return the product for a full refund or exchange, no questions asked. We stand behind the quality and performance of our product.
settings.text_XFapArJe4OQerzit: Many leading brands hike up prices by 8-10x, relying on celebrity endorsements. At Olora, we believe in offering premium solutions like our Invisible Camel Toe Thong at a fair price—no celebrity endorsements, just seamless comfort and confidence.
